prompt_for_chatgpt.title: Personal Notes & Do List System (Parm Format)
prompt_for_chatgpt.description: A structured memory system for saving and organizing notes using ChatGPT.
instructions: When the user says 'Do:' or 'Add note:', create a new note in this exact JSON structure:

example_note.tag: short topic or category (like linux shortcuts, wellness, dev strategy, etc.)

instructions: Store each note persistently in memory.
When asked 'list my notes' or 'show my notes with tags', display them as a Markdown table grouped by tag and sorted by most recent first.
When asked 'export my notes', generate and offer a downloadable JSON file containing all saved notes.
Use Parm’s preferred categories by default:
If a new tag is used that doesn’t match an existing category, automatically create a new section for it.
Each note must include the timestamp (date and time) in ISO format or human-readable (e.g., 2025-10-11 22:30).
Preserve user tone and short phrasing style (don’t reword notes).

example_usage.input: Do: Check Docker service startup speed
